title: what was on the menu last week?

messages.content: what was on the menu last week?
I do not have enough information to answer that.
what is on the menu for next week

The menu for the week of January 19, 2026, includes the following items:

- **Rittman Orchard Apple**
- **BOOMCHICKAPOP Sea Salt Popcorn**
- **Fresh Veggies & Avocado**
- **Hippeas Vegan White Cheddar**
- **Siete Grain Free Tortilla Chips (Lime)**
- **Sea Salt Potato Chips**
- **Surprise Fresh Cut Fruit**
- **Popchips Barbeque**
- **Jackson's Sweet Potato Chips**
- **Crunchy Pretzel Shells**
- **Oven Roasted Turkey Sandwich or Wrap**: Oven roasted turkey, cheddar cheese, leaf lettuce, and a side of honey mustard or olive oil mayo on organic multigrain bread (available on a whole wheat wrap or gluten-free wrap).
- **The Ultimate Veggie Sandwich**: Alfalfa sprouts, pickled red onion, cucumber, avocado mash, cheddar, and roasted garlic chickpea salad on multigrain sprouted bread (gluten-free option available).
- **Chicken Noodle Bone Broth Bowl**: Housemade chicken bone broth, grilled chicken, carrot, celery, broccoli, fresh dill, and egg noodles (gluten-free option available).
- **Greek Chicken Meatball Bowl**: Mediterranean chicken meatballs, cucumber tomato salad, grilled zucchini, feta, wild rice blend, cucumber yogurt dressing (gluten-free).
- **Super Simple Keto Bowl with Cauliflower Rice**: Grilled chicken, broccoli, butternut squash, cauliflower rice, parsley, lemon wedge, extra virgin olive oil, pink Himalayan sea salt (gluten-free).
- **Breakfast Tacos**: Local, pasture-raised scrambled eggs, roasted potatoes, Niman Ranch bacon, cheddar, fire-roasted tomato salsa, avocado, and tortillas (gluten-free and vegetarian options available).
- **Super Simple Bowl with Brown Rice**: Grilled chicken, broccoli, butternut squash, brown rice, parsley, lemon wedge, extra virgin olive oil, pink Himalayan sea salt (gluten-free).
- **Grilled Steak Honey Mustard Salad**: Grass-fed flank steak, smoked mozzarella, cucumber, red pepper, radish, carrot, chives, mixed greens, honey mustard dressing (gluten-free).
- **Red Grape & Walnut Chicken Salad**: Grilled chicken, red grapes, toasted walnuts, jicama, quinoa, mixed greens, poppy seed vinaigrette (gluten-free, vegan option available).

Additionally, the menu includes various **desserts** like the **Luna Bakery Dark Chocolate Sea Salt Cookie** and drinks such as **Local Apple Cider** among others.

### References

- [1] HarvestOwl+Menu+January+19th+2026+NP.pdf
what was on the menu for the 12th

The menu for the week of January 12, 2026, included the following items:

- **Rittman Orchard Apple**
- **BOOMCHICKAPOP Sea Salt Popcorn**
- **Fresh Veggies & Avocado**
- **Hippeas Vegan White Cheddar**
- **Siete Grain Free Tortilla Chips (Lime)**
- **Sea Salt Potato Chips**
- **Surprise Fresh Cut Fruit**
- **Popchips Barbeque**
- **Jackson's Sweet Potato Chips**
- **Crunchy Pretzel Shells**
- **Oven Roasted Turkey Sandwich or Wrap**: Oven roasted turkey, cheddar cheese, leaf lettuce, and a side of honey mustard or olive oil mayo on organic multigrain bread (available on a whole wheat wrap or gluten-free wrap).
- **Thai Peanut Chicken Lettuce Wraps**: Thai peanut sauce, grilled chicken, red pepper, cucumber, carrots, peanuts, in romaine lettuce cups (gluten-free).
- **Grapefruit & Broccoli Chopped Kale Bowl**: Broccoli, grapefruit, wheat berries, raisins, celery, almonds, organic kale, fresh herb yogurt dressing (gluten-free option available).
- **Breakfast Tacos**: Local, pasture-raised scrambled eggs, roasted potatoes, Niman Ranch bacon, cheddar, fire-roasted tomato salsa, avocado, and tortillas (gluten-free and vegetarian options available).
- **Super Simple Keto Bowl with Cauliflower Rice**: Grilled chicken, broccoli, butternut squash, cauliflower rice, parsley, lemon wedge, extra virgin olive oil, pink Himalayan sea salt (gluten-free).
- **Shrimp Pesto Pasta Bowl**: Poached wild Argentinian shrimp, cilantro pumpkin seed pesto, whole wheat pasta, red pepper sauce, sundried tomatoes, grilled zucchini, ricotta salata cheese (gluten-free and vegan options available).
- **Slow Braised Brisket Bowl**: Tender grass-fed braised brisket, roasted potatoes, carrot, green beans, red wine braising sauce, parsley (gluten-free).
- **Super Simple Bowl with Brown Rice**: Grilled chicken, broccoli, butternut squash, brown rice, parsley, lemon wedge, extra virgin olive oil, pink Himalayan sea salt (gluten-free).
- **Red Grape & Walnut Chicken Salad**: Grilled chicken, red grapes, toasted walnuts, jicama, quinoa, mixed greens, poppy seed vinaigrette (gluten-free, vegan option available).
- **Greek Chicken Salad**: Grilled chicken, carrot, green pepper, cucumber, grape tomato, orzo, parsley, Kalamata olive, pickled onions, mixed greens, tangy yogurt dressing (gluten-free and vegetarian options available).
- **The Doctor's Everyday Salad**: Avocado, pumpkin seeds, grape tomato, broccoli, chickpeas, mixed greens with packs of extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, Himalayan sea salt (gluten-free and vegan options available).

### References

- [1] HarvestOwl+Menu+January+12th+2026+NP.pdf
